p: Total RNA was isolated from the tissues of large yellow croaker using TransZol (TransGen Biotech, Beijing, China) followed by quality measurement on agarose gel electrophoresis and Nanodrop® 2000 (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA). The RNA was reversely transcribed to cDNA by PrimeScriptTM RT reagent kit (Takara, Japan) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
